title: Chronicles of Domaria: Book I - The Awakening
description: An ancient ring crosses the path of a young ambitious thief, unleashing a series of mysterious events on the world of Domaria. Cursed, he seeks revenge, while his physical and mental condition decays. A group of inexperienced adventurers is mustered and sent to their own fate to investigate. It will be the beginning of a new age of darkness?
author: L.C. Lopes
